content: wool dryer balls by annie baker anniebakerdesigns com knit your own wool dryer balls these make nice gifts and you can use up your non superwash wool scraps enjoy knitting in progress before felting after first felting materials 3 50mm / us 4 / uk 9 50 double pointed needles set of 5 or circular needles for magic loop 1 stitch marker for each ball 35 yards / 33 meters non-superwash lanolin-free worsted weight wool for each ball 25 yards / 23 meters lanolin-free super bulky roving or felting wool for filling sample knit with cascade 220 heather yarns and filled with briggs and little country roving gauge 26 stitches and 32 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch measurements approximate before felting 8 75 inches around after felting varies depending on wool used and length of in electronic/digital format without permission please do not photograph share copy or distribute this pattern abbreviations k = knit kfb = knit into the front and back of next stitch st s = stitch es k2tog = knit next two stitches together notes  wind ball of roving into a firm ball  you may use any non-superwash wool yarn for inner ball  do not add any oils to dryer balls  don t worry if ball is misshapen before felting it will sort itself out in the dryer wind a ball of roving to a circumference of 8 75 inches cut roving and tuck end into ball with crochet hook or darning needle set aside using backward loop method cast on 20 stitches evenly distributed on four double pointed needles or circular needle leave a 7 inch yarn tail to sew up stitches set up place stitch marker to mark beginning of round knit 4 rounds round 1 kfb k4 repeat 3 times 24 sts round 2 kfb k5 repeat 3 times 28 sts round 3 kfb k6 repeat 3 times 32 sts round 4 kfb k7 repeat 3 times 36 sts round 5 kfb k8 repeat 3 times 40 sts round 6 kfb k9 repeat 3 times 44 sts round 7 kfb k10 repeat 3 times 48 sts round 8 kfb k11 repeat 3 times 52 sts round 9 kfb k12 repeat 3 times 56 sts round 10 kfb k13 repeat 3 times 60 sts rounds 11 to 20 knit round 21 k2tog k13 repeat 3 times 56 sts round 22 k2tog k12 repeat 3 times 52 sts round 23 k2tog k11 repeat 3 times 48 sts round 24 k2tog k10 repeat 3 times 44 sts round 25 k2tog k9 repeat 3 times 40 sts round 26 k2tog k8 repeat 3 times 36 sts round 27 k2tog k7 repeat 3 times 32 sts stuff ball of roving into knitting continue knitting as follows round 28 k2tog
